title: error: LLVM configure failed
body:
I try to build the Rust compiler and associated tools and libraries from the current git sources in Linux Mint 17 Cinnamon 64-bit virtual machine. I installed all the prerequisites by running:

```
$ sudo apt-get install python make git g++ curl valgrind
$ sudo apt-get install pandoc texlive-latex-recommended lmodern
```

Then I downloaded all the sources:

```
$ git clone git://github.com/mozilla/rust.git
$ cd rust
```

I don't understand the reason because the file `/home/bbc/rust/src/llvm/configure` in fact exists.
Is something wrong with rust or with my setup? Did I miss something?
